text: Mézery-près-Donneloye was a municipality in Yverdon in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 January 2008, it joined together with Donneloye and Gossens to become one municipality called Donneloye.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 July 2011 == References == ==Other websites== Category:2008 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Vaud Category:Villages in Vaud
title: Mézery-près-Donneloye
